Passage.PassageText: Once upon a time, there was an ugly barnacle named {{ $ctx.barnacleName }}. He was so {{ "ugly" }}...

Choice.Text: "That didn't help at all", Spongebob said with tears welling in his eyes.

Choice.ChoiceText: ...that he decided to be beautiful of spirit instead, and everyone loved him.

Sequence.Text: "Thanks Patrick, I feel a little better", Spongebob said, the world feeling a bit lighter.
"Yeah, right. Like that would ever happen", Spongebob said, doubling down on his forlorn feelings.
Spongebob and Patrick continued to watch the movie in silence.
